A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
You can't please the fans!
The reveal about Reys parents was destined to be criticised whichever way it went. I'm very happy they went the route they did\,l.
This film feels fresh and original\, it plays with and breaks tropes. It's slow burning\, covers a small period of time and really focuses on characters.
Adam Driver and Mark Hamill stand out as exceptional perfomers. Driver in paticular makes "the bad guy" human\, relatable and beleivable.
My favourite installment yet.
